article:
It is Sunday today. I'm on the beach  _ my friends. The beach is beautiful. And it's really a good  _ to have fun.
Look!What are my friends  _ ?Jack and Tom are playing volleyball. Mike,Lily and Jane are  _ them.Sam is reading a book. He likes books very much,and it's his  _ to be a writer. Who is _ in the water?Oh,it's Peter. He swims very well. Some children are asking him to  _ them to swim .He's happy to do that. _ are the other people?Oh,they are  _ a party over there. They are singing, dancing, and eating nice food .It's fun. I want to  _ them!
